message: I've recently installed middleman on a ruby 1.8.7 stack (w devkit) on a Windows 7 x64 machine. When I run mm-init projectname, it generates the project. When I run mm-server from the project directory, it does start something (silently), however nothing shows up at localhost:4567. Changing ports doesn't help. When I close the server by hitting ctrl+c, it throws me a lot stuff:

from C:/Ruby187/bin/mm-server:19:in `load'
        from C:/Ruby187/bin/mm-server:19
Terminate batch job (Y/N)? y

D:\_Projects\www\middleman\boilerplate>
Let's cover this on the Github issue tracker, okay?
